imagines the trumpets & the flags: the presence

can to supply what is so obviously a part of
the Gammer Gurton Needle, of A Woman Killed
play.

At some point in

              Elizabethan
             drama,
however, the reader is born. There are scenes
or speeches that call upon his reader special
faculty. It is When the dramatist becomes
[curious?] of play as a work of art, when there is
a conection between the scenes, when we can
still feel the presenting connecting them
not because the plot drives him to forward
but because he has another unity in mind,

reader: a

extinct
animal.
the reader's faculty To write the life of the
reader from Elizabeth for the past three hundred years:
to discover at what point his ear loses its
acuteness: when his eye became dull; when,
to balance these losses, he became word conscious,
when time supplied conscious of the suggestions
& echoes, &, as time passed, added
what probably much that was unintended by the writer –
[And?] now we so often enjoy the associations
that are suggested by old spellings even,
the contrast that an unfamiliar use of
words suggests suggests between one age &
a past age & our own –– all this
And further, as the habit of reading becomes
habitual, the faculty a unusual faculty
it there are it loses [illeg.]
as we see that [dugs?] develop a read seems

very large class of [perfectly?] literate people who
